item.title: Vote 4 Cash help?
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

Hey guys I am have a problem trying to setup my Vote 4 Cash system!
I have the php file and I have all the code in correctly into server.
I upload to webhost fine and then I setup voteing link.
I try to vote then it says you have already voted once today?

Help would be greatly appreciated!

heres code for client.java

public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) { try { String urlString = "http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=up&server=pkspawn.no-ip.biztype=checkvote&username="+playerName; urlString = urlString.replaceAll(" ", "%20"); URL url = new URL(urlString); BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream())); String results = reader.readLine(); if(results.length() > 0) { if(results.equals("user needs reward...")) return true; else return false; } } catch (MalformedURLException e) { System.out.println("Malformed URL Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)"); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("IO Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)"); } return false; }

Thanks

Regards,
Nic

Read full topic
